content.html: Lycett was genius. He ruthlessly exposed the vacuity of BBC news journalists who see their primary function as not upsetting the Tories. Brilliant trolling of massively overrated mediocrities. The quality of TV political journalism is (or should be) a source of national shame.
content.value: Lycett was genius. He ruthlessly exposed the vacuity of BBC news journalists who see their primary function as not upsetting the Tories. Brilliant trolling of massively overrated mediocrities. The quality of TV political journalism is (or should be) a source of national shame.
